name: Sproot
description:
Download, unzip, and open the sproot.nwjs file (windows). 

Keyboard Controls: 

A/D or Arrows to move

Space to bury 

Gamepad Controls:

Left stick to move

Bottom face button to bury 

ESC or Select key at any time to get back to the main menu.

Known bug - saving level progress when exiting the game, so you have to play all 5 levels in one go.  I'll do an update for this later...
